changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Create constraints and indexes for CHEBI nodes, created on 04/05/2022

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: load CHEBI chebi.tsv from chebi-data-04052022.zip, 159840 rows

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows as row MERGE (n:db_CHEBI {eid: row.eid}) SET n:Chemical,n.name=row.name,n.definition=row.definition,n.formula=row.formula,n.charge=row.charge,n.inchi_key=row.inchi_key,n.inchi=row.inchi,n.smiles=row.smiles,n.mass=row.mass,n.alt_id=row.alt_id,n.data_source='CHEBI'

changeSet.id: load db_CHEBI synonyms from chebi-data-04052022.zip, date 04/05/2022
changeSet.author: rcai

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row MERGE (a:Synonym {name: row.name}) SET a.lowercase_name=toLower(row.name) WITH row, a MATCH (b:db_CHEBI {eid: row.eid}) MERGE (b)-[r:HAS_SYNONYM]->(a)

changeSet.id: load IS_A relationship in chebi-rels.tsv from chebi-data-04052022.zip, date 04/05/2022
changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load CHEBI IS_A relationships, chebi-rels.tsv from chebi-data-04052022.zip

customChange.query: UNWIND $rows AS row with row where row.RELATIONSHIP='IS_A' MATCH (a:db_CHEBI {eid: row.from_id}), (b:db_CHEBI {eid: row.to_id}) MERGE (a)-[r:IS_A]->(b) RETURN COUNT(*)

changeSet.author: rcai
changeSet.comment: Load CHEBI IS_CONJUGATE_BASE_OF relationships, chebi-rels.tsv from chebi-data-04052022.zip
